This gives: ξr,s(t+Δt)≈[1−(δr,s,tD+δr,s)Δt]Kr,sp(t)Kr,sp(t+Δt)ξr,s(t)+Ir,s,tξ+Ir,s,tpKr,sp(t+Δt)Δt\xi_{r,s}(t+\Delta t) \approx [1-(\delta^D_{r,s,t} + \delta_{r,s}) \Delta t] \frac{K^p_{r,s}(t)}{K^p_{r,s}(t+\Delta t)}\xi_{r,s}(t) + \frac{I^{\xi}_{r,s,t} + I^{p}_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t+\Delta t)} \Delta tξr,s​(t+Δt)≈[1−(δr,s,tD​+δr,s​)Δt]Kr,sp​(t+Δt)Kr,sp​(t)​ξr,s​(t)+Kr,sp​(t+Δt)Ir,s,tξ​+Ir,s,tp​​Δt

Step 2: Approximate the potential capital ratio

For Kr,sp(t+Δt)K^p_{r,s}(t+\Delta t)Kr,sp​(t+Δt), we have: Kr,sp(t+Δt)=e−δr,sΔtKr,sp(t)+Ir,s,tp1−e−δr,sΔtδr,sK^p_{r,s}(t+\Delta t) = e^{-\delta_{r,s} \Delta t}K^p_{r,s}(t) + I^p_{r,s,t}\frac{1 - e^{-\delta_{r,s} \Delta t}}{\delta_{r,s}}Kr,sp​(t+Δt)=e−δr,s​ΔtKr,sp​(t)+Ir,s,tp​δr,s​1−e−δr,s​Δt​

Simplification 2: Apply e−x≈1−xe^{-x} \approx 1 - xe−x≈1−x and 1−e−xx≈1\frac{1-e^{-x}}{x} \approx 1x1−e−x​≈1 for small δr,sΔt\delta_{r,s} \Delta tδr,s​Δt: Kr,sp(t+Δt)≈(1−δr,sΔt)Kr,sp(t)+Ir,s,tpΔtK^p_{r,s}(t+\Delta t) \approx (1-\delta_{r,s} \Delta t)K^p_{r,s}(t) + I^p_{r,s,t} \Delta tKr,sp​(t+Δt)≈(1−δr,s​Δt)Kr,sp​(t)+Ir,s,tp​Δt

Now we need the ratio Kr,sp(t)Kr,sp(t+Δt)\frac{K^p_{r,s}(t)}{K^p_{r,s}(t+\Delta t)}Kr,sp​(t+Δt)Kr,sp​(t)​: Kr,sp(t)Kr,sp(t+Δt)=Kr,sp(t)(1−δr,sΔt)Kr,sp(t)+Ir,s,tpΔt\frac{K^p_{r,s}(t)}{K^p_{r,s}(t+\Delta t)} = \frac{K^p_{r,s}(t)}{(1-\delta_{r,s} \Delta t)K^p_{r,s}(t) + I^p_{r,s,t} \Delta t}Kr,sp​(t+Δt)Kr,sp​(t)​=(1−δr,s​Δt)Kr,sp​(t)+Ir,s,tp​ΔtKr,sp​(t)​

=11−δr,sΔt+Ir,s,tpΔtKr,sp(t)= \frac{1}{1-\delta_{r,s} \Delta t + \frac{I^p_{r,s,t} \Delta t}{K^p_{r,s}(t)}}=1−δr,s​Δt+Kr,sp​(t)Ir,s,tp​Δt​1​

Simplification 3: Use 11+x≈1−x\frac{1}{1+x} \approx 1-x1+x1​≈1−x for small xxx: Kr,sp(t)Kr,sp(t+Δt)≈1+δr,sΔt−Ir,s,tpKr,sp(t)Δt\frac{K^p_{r,s}(t)}{K^p_{r,s}(t+\Delta t)} \approx 1 + \delta_{r,s} \Delta t - \frac{I^p_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t)} \Delta tKr,sp​(t+Δt)Kr,sp​(t)​≈1+δr,s​Δt−Kr,sp​(t)Ir,s,tp​​Δt

Step 3: Combine the first term

Now we multiply: [1−(δr,s,tD+δr,s)Δt][1+δr,sΔt−Ir,s,tpKr,sp(t)Δt]ξr,s(t)[1-(\delta^D_{r,s,t} + \delta_{r,s}) \Delta t][1 + \delta_{r,s} \Delta t - \frac{I^p_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t)} \Delta t]\xi_{r,s}(t)[1−(δr,s,tD​+δr,s​)Δt][1+δr,s​Δt−Kr,sp​(t)Ir,s,tp​​Δt]ξr,s​(t)

Simplification 4: Expand and keep only first-order terms in Δt\Delta tΔt (drop terms with (Δt)2(\Delta t)^2(Δt)2): =[1−δr,s,tDΔt−δr,sΔt+δr,sΔt−Ir,s,tpKr,sp(t)Δt+O((Δt)2)]ξr,s(t)= [1 - \delta^D_{r,s,t} \Delta t - \delta_{r,s} \Delta t + \delta_{r,s} \Delta t - \frac{I^p_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t)} \Delta t + O((\Delta t)^2)]\xi_{r,s}(t)=[1−δr,s,tD​Δt−δr,s​Δt+δr,s​Δt−Kr,sp​(t)Ir,s,tp​​Δt+O((Δt)2)]ξr,s​(t)

=[1−δr,s,tDΔt−Ir,s,tpKr,sp(t)Δt]ξr,s(t)= [1 - \delta^D_{r,s,t} \Delta t - \frac{I^p_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t)} \Delta t]\xi_{r,s}(t)=[1−δr,s,tD​Δt−Kr,sp​(t)Ir,s,tp​​Δt]ξr,s​(t)

Step 4: Separate the investment term

Rearranging: ξr,s(t+Δt)≈(1−δr,s,tDΔt)ξr,s(t)−Ir,s,tpKr,sp(t)Δt⋅ξr,s(t)+Ir,s,tξ+Ir,s,tpKr,sp(t+Δt)Δt\xi_{r,s}(t+\Delta t) \approx (1 - \delta^D_{r,s,t} \Delta t)\xi_{r,s}(t) - \frac{I^p_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t)} \Delta t \cdot \xi_{r,s}(t) + \frac{I^{\xi}_{r,s,t} + I^{p}_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t+\Delta t)} \Delta tξr,s​(t+Δt)≈(1−δr,s,tD​Δt)ξr,s​(t)−Kr,sp​(t)Ir,s,tp​​Δt⋅ξr,s​(t)+Kr,sp​(t+Δt)Ir,s,tξ​+Ir,s,tp​​Δt

=(1−δr,s,tDΔt)ξr,s(t)+Ir,s,tξKr,sp(t+Δt)Δt+Ir,s,tpKr,sp(t+Δt)Δt−Ir,s,tpKr,sp(t)Δt⋅ξr,s(t)= (1 - \delta^D_{r,s,t} \Delta t)\xi_{r,s}(t) + \frac{I^{\xi}_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t+\Delta t)} \Delta t + \frac{I^{p}_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t+\Delta t)} \Delta t - \frac{I^p_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t)} \Delta t \cdot \xi_{r,s}(t)=(1−δr,s,tD​Δt)ξr,s​(t)+Kr,sp​(t+Δt)Ir,s,tξ​​Δt+Kr,sp​(t+Δt)Ir,s,tp​​Δt−Kr,sp​(t)Ir,s,tp​​Δt⋅ξr,s​(t)

Step 5: Recognize the (1−ξr,s,t)(1-\xi_{r,s,t})(1−ξr,s,t​) factor

Key observation: We need to relate Ir,s,tpKr,sp(t+Δt)\frac{I^{p}_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t+\Delta t)}Kr,sp​(t+Δt)Ir,s,tp​​ and Ir,s,tpKr,sp(t)\frac{I^{p}_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t)}Kr,sp​(t)Ir,s,tp​​.

Since Kr,sp(t+Δt)≈Kr,sp(t)+O(Δt)K^p_{r,s}(t+\Delta t) \approx K^p_{r,s}(t) + O(\Delta t)Kr,sp​(t+Δt)≈Kr,sp​(t)+O(Δt), to first order: Ir,s,tpKr,sp(t+Δt)≈Ir,s,tpKr,sp(t)[1−O(Δt)]\frac{I^{p}_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t+\Delta t)} \approx \frac{I^{p}_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t)}[1 - O(\Delta t)]Kr,sp​(t+Δt)Ir,s,tp​​≈Kr,sp​(t)Ir,s,tp​​[1−O(Δt)]

Therefore: Ir,s,tpKr,sp(t+Δt)Δt−Ir,s,tpKr,sp(t)Δt⋅ξr,s(t)=Ir,s,tpKr,sp(t+Δt)Δt(1−ξr,s(t))\frac{I^{p}_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t+\Delta t)} \Delta t - \frac{I^p_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t)} \Delta t \cdot \xi_{r,s}(t) = \frac{I^{p}_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t+\Delta t)} \Delta t (1 - \xi_{r,s}(t))Kr,sp​(t+Δt)Ir,s,tp​​Δt−Kr,sp​(t)Ir,s,tp​​Δt⋅ξr,s​(t)=Kr,sp​(t+Δt)Ir,s,tp​​Δt(1−ξr,s​(t))

Step 6: Final result for Δt=1\Delta t = 1Δt=1

Setting Δt=1\Delta t = 1Δt=1: ξr,s,t+1≈(1−δr,s,tD)ξr,s,t+Ir,s,tξKr,sp(t+1)+Ir,s,tpKr,sp(t+1)(1−ξr,s,t)\xi_{r,s,t+1} \approx (1-\delta^D_{r,s,t})\xi_{r,s,t} + \frac{I^{\xi}_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t+1)} + \frac{I^{p}_{r,s,t}}{K^p_{r,s}(t+1)}(1 - \xi_{r,s,t})ξr,s,t+1​≈(1−δr,s,tD​)ξr,s,t​+Kr,sp​(t+1)Ir,s,tξ​​+Kr,sp​(t+1)Ir,s,tp​​(1−ξr,s,t​)

Note: The investment terms are normalized by Kr,sp(t+1)K^p_{r,s}(t+1)Kr,sp​(t+1) to be consistent with the exact solution. The (1−ξr,s,t)(1-\xi_{r,s,t})(1−ξr,s,t​) factor appears with Ir,s,tpI^p_{r,s,t}Ir,s,tp​ and emerges from the interaction between the decay term and the potential capital ratio.

This confirms that the (δr,s,tD+δr,s)(\delta^D_{r,s,t} + \delta_{r,s})(δr,s,tD​+δr,s​) term in the exact solution correctly simplifies to give the expected result where:

  • The capacity factor depreciates only due to damage (δr,s,tD\delta^D_{r,s,t}δr,s,tD​)
  • New capital investment contributes proportionally to (1−ξr,s,t)(1-\xi_{r,s,t})(1−ξr,s,t​)
  • The interaction effects with δr,s\delta_{r,s}δr,s​ cancel out in the first-order approximation
